alert.note: Alert for Lower Bucks; Monroe; Northampton; Upper Bucks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 12 at 4:45AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A line of showers with locally strong winds will impact portions of central Morris, Hunterdon, Sussex, Warren, northwestern Somerset, northwestern Bucks, east central Monroe and eastern Northampton Counties through 545 AM EST... At 444 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Greeley to Echo Lake to near Old Orchard. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Easton, Newton, Montague, Bethlehem, Dover, Hopatcong, Forks, East Stroudsburg, Hackettstown, Quakertown, Doylestown, Byram, Wilson, Bedminster, Wharton, Washington, Rockaway, Blairstown, Hellertown and Nazareth. This includes the following highways... Interstate 78 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 66 and 76. Interstate 78 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 29. Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 313 and 314. Interstate 80 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 37. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Bucks; Monroe; Northampton; Upper Bucks
